tests.title: should work (mocked)
tests.fullTitle: LocalAPI postMessage() should work (mocked)
tests.code: const msg=new Message("Hello World");const fetch=__name(async(url,options)=>{assert.strictEqual(url,"http://vestaboard.local:7000/local-api/message");assert.deepStrictEqual(options,{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json","X-Vestaboard-Local-Api-Key":"3eadf7a8-6602-4bf5-92f4-970d36066958"},body:JSON.stringify(msg.toCharArray())});return{ok:true,status:201,statusText:"CREATED",json:__name(async()=>"","json")}},"fetch");const api=new LocalAPI("3eadf7a8-6602-4bf5-92f4-970d36066958",void 0,{fetch});await api.postMessage("Hello World")

tests.title: should work with all charts defined in CHAR_MAP
tests.fullTitle: Message static string2chars() should work with all charts defined in CHAR_MAP
tests.code: let text="";const result=[];CHAR_MAP.forEach(([str,chars])=>{const actual=Message.string2chars(str,{removeUnsupportedWords:false});const expected=chars.length!==1||chars[0]!==-2?chars:[0];assert.deepStrictEqual(actual,expected,`Unable to process char "${str}": string2chars returned ${JSON.stringify(actual)}, but expected result was ${JSON.stringify(expected)}`);text+=str;result.push(...expected)});assert.deepStrictEqual(Message.string2chars(text,{removeUnsupportedWords:false}),result)

tests.title: should start writing from top/left
tests.fullTitle: Message write() should start writing from top/left

tests.title: should accept line & row for positioning
tests.fullTitle: Message write() should accept line & row for positioning
tests.code:
const msg=new Message;msg.write("Hello World",{position:{line:2,row:5}});assert.strictEqual(msg.toString(),"#==============================================#
#                                              #
#                                              #
#           H E L L O   W O R L D              #
#                                              #
#                                              #
#                                              #
#==============================================#
")

tests.title: should add another line if text is too long
tests.fullTitle: Message write() should add another line if text is too long
tests.code:
const msg=new Message;msg.write("Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consetetur sadipscing elitr, sed diam nonumy eirmod tempor invidunt");assert.strictEqual(msg.toString(),"#==============================================#
# L O R E M   I P S U M   D O L O R   S I T    #
# A M E T ,   C O N S E T E T U R              #
# S A D I P S C I N G   E L I T R ,   S E D    #
# D I A M   N O N U M Y   E I R M O D          #
# T E M P O R   I N V I D U N T                #
#                                              #
#==============================================#
")

tests.title: should work with words > board length
tests.fullTitle: Message write() should work with words > board length
tests.code:
const msg=new Message;msg.write("Lorem-ipsum-dolor-sit-amet");assert.strictEqual(msg.toString(),"#==============================================#
# L O R E M - I P S U M - D O L O R - S I T -  #
# A M E T                                      #
#                                              #
#                                              #
#                                              #
#                                              #
#==============================================#
")

tests.title: should allow to use NEXT_LINE flag
tests.fullTitle: Message write() should allow to use NEXT_LINE flag
tests.code:
const msg=new Message;msg.write("13:00",{position:MessageWritePosition.NEXT_LINE});msg.write("Daily",{indent:true});msg.write("",{position:MessageWritePosition.NEXT_LINE});msg.write("18:00",{position:MessageWritePosition.NEXT_LINE});msg.write("Fischst\xE4bchen, Spinat & Ei",{indent:true});msg.write("",{position:MessageWritePosition.NEXT_LINE});msg.write("20:00",{position:MessageWritePosition.NEXT_LINE});msg.write("Sandm\xE4nnchen",{indent:true});assert.strictEqual(msg.toString(),"#==============================================#
# 1 3 : 0 0   D A I L Y                        #
#                                              #
# 1 8 : 0 0   F I S C H S T A E B C H E N ,    #
#             S P I N A T   &   E I            #
#                                              #
# 2 0 : 0 0   S A N D M A E N N C H E N        #
#==============================================#
")

tests.title: should support the NO_SPACE_BETWEEN flag
tests.fullTitle: Message write() should support the NO_SPACE_BETWEEN flag
tests.code:
const msg=new Message;msg.write("Rindfleisch").write("etikettierungs",{position:MessageWritePosition.NO_SPACE_BETWEEN}).write("ueberwachungs",{position:MessageWritePosition.NO_SPACE_BETWEEN}).write("aufgaben",{position:MessageWritePosition.NO_SPACE_BETWEEN}).write("uebertragungs",{position:MessageWritePosition.NO_SPACE_BETWEEN}).write("gesetz",{position:MessageWritePosition.NO_SPACE_BETWEEN}).write("(das)");assert.strictEqual(msg.toString(),"#==============================================#
# R I N D F L E I S C H                        #
# E T I K E T T I E R U N G S                  #
# U E B E R W A C H U N G S A U F G A B E N    #
# U E B E R T R A G U N G S G E S E T Z        #
# ( D A S )                                    #
#                                              #
#==============================================#
")

tests.fullTitle: Message write() should support \n

tests.fullTitle: Message write() should remove unsupported words by default

tests.title: should not break if message is way too long
tests.fullTitle: Message write() should not break if message is way too long
tests.code:
const msg=new Message;msg.write("Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisici elit, sed eiusmod tempor incidunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.");msg.write("Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquid ex ea commodi consequat.");msg.write("Quis aute iure reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur.");msg.write("Excepteur sint obcaecat cupiditat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.");assert.strictEqual(msg.toString(),"#==============================================#
# L O R E M   I P S U M   D O L O R   S I T    #
# A M E T ,   C O N S E C T E T U R            #
# A D I P I S I C I   E L I T ,   S E D        #
# E I U S M O D   T E M P O R I N C I D U N T  #
# U T   L A B O R E   E T   D O L O R E        #
# M A G N A   A L I Q U A .   U T   E N I M    #
#==============================================#
")

tests.title: should work with a very basic example
tests.fullTitle: Message table() should work with a very basic example

tests.title: should just fill the space available if too full
tests.fullTitle: Message table() should just fill the space available if too full
tests.code:
const msg=new Message;msg.table([["now","Daily"],["13:00","Super Secret Meeting"],["16:30","Awesome Presentation"]]);assert.strictEqual(msg.toString(),"#==============================================#
# N O W       D A I L Y                        #
#                                              #
# 1 3 : 0 0   S U P E R   S E C R E T          #
#             M E E T I N G                    #
#                                              #
# 1 6 : 3 0   A W E S O M E   P R E S E N T -  #
#==============================================#
")

tests.title: should pay attention to the cursor
tests.fullTitle: Message table() should pay attention to the cursor
tests.code:
const msg=new Message;msg.write("Hello World
");msg.table([["now","Daily"],["13:00","Secret Meeting"]]);assert.strictEqual(msg.toString(),"#==============================================#
# H E L L O   W O R L D                        #
#                                              #
# N O W         D A I L Y                      #
#                                              #
# 1 3 : 0 0     S E C R E T   M E E T I N G    #
#                                              #
#==============================================#
")

tests.title: should work (multi mode)
tests.fullTitle: SubscriptionAPI postMessage() should work (multi mode)
tests.code: const fetch=__name(async(url,options)=>{const msg=new Message("Hello World");assert.strictEqual(url,"https://platform.vestaboard.com/subscriptions/foo/message");assert.deepStrictEqual(options,{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json","X-Vestaboard-Api-Key":"3eadf7a8-6602-4bf5-92f4-970d36066958","X-Vestaboard-Api-Secret":"******************************"},body:JSON.stringify({characters:msg.toCharArray()})});return{ok:true,status:200,statusText:"OK",json:__name(async()=>({message:{id:"",created:1}}),"json")}},"fetch");const api=new SubscriptionAPI("3eadf7a8-6602-4bf5-92f4-970d36066958","******************************",{fetch});const result=await api.postMessage("Hello World",["foo","foo"]);assert.deepStrictEqual(result,[{message:{id:"",created:1}},{message:{id:"",created:1}}])
